execution_quality: Agent edited the configuration file appropriately, but the subsequent error indicates the edit may not have fully resolved the user's intent or there was an underlying issue in the project setup.
work_category: Configuration modification to specify a dependency source from git repository instead of PyPI.
summary: The agent made a focused edit to redirect a dependency to git source as requested, but this triggered a downstream error in the build process. The agent did not investigate the error or provide guidance on resolution, leaving the user to troubleshoot further.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a build error immediately after the edit, suggesting the change either introduced a new problem or failed to address the root cause.
